title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Hyouketsu no Kizuna
synopsis: Covered in ice and snow, Elior Forest is the home to dangerous magical beasts and 50 elves frozen in ice. One day, the great spirit Puck helps a young girl break out of her ice prison. Her name is Emilia, a half-elf born with silver hair, long ears, and amethyst eyesâ€”features that resemble the evil Witch who destroyed half the world long ago.
